Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.observer

Class EventManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.observer.EventManager
public class EventManager extends Object
The EventManager class is responsible for managing event listeners and notifications. It maintains a map of event types to listeners, allowing for efficient event dispatching. Each event type is represented by a class that extends Enum, and each listener is an instance of the Listener interface. The class provides methods for subscribing and unsubscribing listeners, notifying listeners of events, and retrieving listeners.

  • Constructor Details

    • EventManager

      public EventManager()

  • Method Details

    • subscribe

      public <E extends Enum<E>> void subscribe(Class<E> eventType, Listener<E> listener)
      Subscribes a listener to a specific event type. If the event type is not already in the map, it is added with an empty list of listeners. The listener is then added to the list of listeners for that event type.
      Type Parameters:
      E - The type of the event.
      Parameters:
      eventType - The class of the event type to subscribe to.
      listener - The listener to subscribe.

    • unsubscribe

      public <E extends Enum<E>> void unsubscribe(Class<E> eventType, Listener<E> listener)
      Unsubscribes a listener from a specific event type. If the event type and listener are in the map, the listener is removed from the list of listeners for that event type.
      Type Parameters:
      E - The type of the event.
      Parameters:
      eventType - The class of the event type to unsubscribe from.
      listener - The listener to unsubscribe.

    • notify

      public <E extends Enum<E>> void notify(E event, Object... args)
      Notifies all listeners of a specific event type. Each listener's update method is called with the event and any additional arguments.
      Type Parameters:
      E - The type of the event.
      Parameters:
      event - The event to notify listeners of.
      args - Any additional arguments to pass to the listeners.

    • getListener

      public Listener<? extends Enum<?>> getListener(Class<? extends Enum<?>> classToListen, Function<Listener<? extends Enum<?>>,Boolean> func)
      Retrieves a listener for a specific event type that matches a given condition. The condition is specified by a function that takes a listener and returns a boolean. The function is applied to each listener for the event type until it returns true or all listeners have been checked. If a matching listener is found, it is returned. Otherwise, null is returned.
      Parameters:
      classToListen - The class of the event type to retrieve a listener for.
      func - The function to apply to each listener.
      Returns:
      The first listener for which the function returns true, or null if no such listener is found.
